mapper.insert: INSERT INTO income_log( orderid, appid, guid, superGuid, userLevel, income, state, totalFee, createTime )VALUES( #{orderid}, #{appid}, #{guid}, #{superGuid}, #{userLevel}, #{income}, #{state}, #{totalFee}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: select ifnull(sum(income) ,0) as income from income_log where superGuid=#{superGuid} and appid=#{appid} and userLevel=#{userLevel} and DATEDIFF(createTime,#{day})=0
